question: National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme and Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan were introduced in which of the following plans?
option1: Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan in 9th Five Year Plan & NREGA in 10th five year plan
option2: Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan in 9th Five Year Plan & NREGA in 11th five year plan
option3: Both Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan & NREGA in 10th five year plan
option4: Both Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan & NREGA in 11th five year plan
answer: Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan in 9th Five Year Plan & NREGA in 10th five year plan
explanation:
Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan: The Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan was launched towards the end of the Ninth Plan to achieve the goal of UEE through a time-bound integrated approach, in partnership with states.
NREGA: NREGA was launched on February 2, 2006 in 200 most backward districts, in the first phase was expanded to 330 districts in the second phase . The remaining 266 districts have been notified on September 28, 2007 where the scheme came into effect from April 1, 2008.
